Package javelin.controller.quality.resistance

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CriticalImmunity
    Applied to Kits in the sense that some monsters should be able to dodge mortal strikes, Matrix-style, not as intended in the SRD where it would presume a monster without discernible or sensitive critical parts.
    DamageReduction
    A major point of damage reduction in d20 is that it can be entirely bypassed.
    EnergyImmunity
    This is a tricky one because since we're treating all energy types as the same one, and this is a high-rated special quality at 1cr per energy type, it means that any monster with a immunity immediately is at least level 5 - including, for example, a Small Skeleton.
    EnergyResistance
    Tries to treat all energies as a single resistance.
    MindImmunity
    This is not an official d20 SRD quality but represents the mind-effect resistance many Monsters have.
    ParalysisImmunity
    Reader and Upgrade for paralysis immunity.
    PoisonImmunity
    Reader and Upgrade for poison immunity.
    SpellImmunity
    See more info on the d20 SRD.
    SpellResistance
    See more info on the d20 SRD.
